_comment: Created by EFisher on 12/10/2015 14:31:55 using v2.7
title: Are GPs open at times that are convenient and are patients satisfied with this?
analysis_commentary: The percentage of patients who said that the opening hours of their surgery were convenient for them was 74% in 2014/15 and 75% of patients were satisfied with their GP surgery opening hours. Since 2011/12 there has been a decline in these results; patient satisfaction with GP surgery open hours is now at its lowest level since 2010/11.
